text: Valerie McClain-Ward (born February 14, 1956) is an American rowing coxswain. She competed in the women's coxed four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Berkeley, California Category:Coxswains (rowing)
title: Valerie McClain-Ward
